author: holiman
content: I'm getting `0xb76720f865be48af97cc5c8a33024bd967eb78db21e1aeac8a07f80bdce228f7` as receipt root now <@!213672586264051717> . PTAL at https://gist.github.com/holiman/da7ea388dfe503ebb53a48c884bd5212

author: holiman
content: <@!213672586264051717> I regenerated them here now: https://github.com/lightclient/go-ethereum/tree/impl-eip-2718/core/testdata -- it's now a segment of 10 contiguous blocks, and I dumped the genesis in there aswell (it's a yolov2:ish genesis, but don't bother verifying any header PoW or PoA)

author: 0xraino
content: <@!211091239112671234> all the `receipts` fields are `null`. Is that intentional?

author: holiman
content: Oh, right. Myeah, not quite _intentional_, more like I didn't explicitly pull them out from the executor and expose them...

author: holiman
content: I was hoping that wouldn't be needed

author: 0xraino
content: Because now we can actually execute the transactions and generate the receipts since they're continguous?

author: holiman
content: Yes. But I can dig them out for you

author: 0xraino
content:
It's ok, I can change the test to just import the blocks.

Also, I haven't looked into what kinds of reference tests are possible, are we straying into that territory right now? If so, maybe it's worth it to just go straight there?

author: sky.cactus
content: <@!211091239112671234> or <@273808422753796097> Any chance you can review https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/3150 ?  Waiting on an approval for a while on it from one of you so it can get merged.

author: sky.cactus
content: I *think* it aligns with what people have implemented, was just missing from the spec.

author: holiman
content: Yes, this is bordering reference tests, but if we can iron out some kinks now, might be good. I don't know if retesteth needs to be modified in order to make the _actual_ reference tests
